author: PlayStation
description:
The Sims™ 4 Adventure Awaits Expansion Pack* arrives Oct 2 and is available for pre-order now.
 
Order now through Nov 13 for the Warm & Cozy Digital Content**; the Toasty Tower Lamp, Toast-Tea Kettle, and Toasty Tootsies Socks. 
  
New experiences are out there for you to discover – or create! Make Getaways that last a day or more like a kids’ camp, fitness retreat, or even a romantic contest. Plus, create Custom Venues for Sims to explore and share them to the Gallery for other Simmers to enjoy.
Nurture the spirit of play in childhood and carry it through a bold, adventurous life. Kids will find their playtime more meaningful than ever with Childhood Sentiments, Imaginary Friends, and more ways to play like new games, Skills, and Modular Playgrounds you can customize. 
 
Available October 2 at 10AM PT on PlayStation®4, and PlayStation®5. Pre-order now
 
*Requires The Sims 4 & all game updates.
 
#ps5 #ps5games #ps4 #ps4games #thesims4
title: The Sims 4 - Adventure Awaits Expansion Pack Reveal Trailer | PS5 & PS4 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/en-us/product/UP1023-PPSA29154_00-DXMTSFULLGAME000

Suit up for an epic sci-fi adventure in Daemon X Machina: Titanic Scion. Customize your perfect Arsenal, and experiment with alien abilities to grow stronger. Explore a deadly and dangerous world alone or with friends, looting resources and rewards from battle to give you an edge in your fight against the oppressive Sovereign Axiom. The battle for humanity's freedom starts today!

#ps5 #ps5games #daemonxmachina
title: Daemon X Machina: Titanic Scion - Launch Trailer | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10007200/

Dark Light, the acclaimed sci-fi action platformer, comes to PS4 on September 5, 2025. 
Following its PS5 debut, the game now expands to PS4 by popular demand. This trailer showcases both Normal Mode and Pixel Mode gameplay, highlighting the game’s intense combat, atmospheric world, and unique survival challenges. Step into the darkness and fight to endure a post-apocalyptic future.
#PS5 #PS5games #PS4 #PS4games #DarkLight

Rated Mature
title: Dark Light - Launch Trailer | PS5 & PS4 Games
